anya-e0905n2:69_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha koci viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n2:72_1: ahaṁ āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ imesaṁ nissaggiyapācittiyasikkhāpadānaṁ
anya-e0905n2:72_2: yāva chabbassasikkhāpadaṁ nidānādīni pucchitabbāni anekāni ṭhānāni pucchiṁ,
anya-e0905n2:72_3: puṭṭhopuṭṭho ca so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṁso vissajjesi,
anya-e0905n2:72_4: itihidaṁ bhante imāni sikkhāpadāni nimmalāni suparisuddhānī tasseva bhagavato vacanāni arahato sammāsambuddhassa,

anya-e0905n2:72_6: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ dhammavinayaṁ saṁgāyiṁsu ceva anusaṁgāyiṁsu ca,

anya-e0905n2:72_8: paṭṭhāya imāni nissaggiyasikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā saṁhāyeyyāma.

anya-e0905n2:76_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.

anya-e0905n2:89_0: Pucchā – rūpiyaṁ āvuso paṭiggaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:91_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:92_1: āyasmantaṁ bhante upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,

anya-e0905n2:109_0: Pucchā – kathaṁ āvuso tattha paṭipajjanto bhikkhu na kayavikkayaṁ samāpajjatināma.

anya-e0905n2:145_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:146_1: āyasmantaṁ bhante upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:146_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṁ āpajji,

anya-e0905n2:155_0: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:156_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū tiṇṇaṁ cīvarānaṁ aññataraṁ cīvaraṁ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṁ vippavasiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:158_1: yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ atthano pariṇāmentassa nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ.

anya-e0905n2:161_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:162_0: Pucchā – jānaṁ āvuso saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmento, kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n2:163_1: jānaṁ bhante saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmento dve āpattiyo āpajjati,
anya-e0905n2:163_4: jānaṁ bhante saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmento imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n2:165_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n2:168_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso tattha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n2:171_1: ahaṁ bhante imesaṁ soḷasannaṁ nissaggiyapācittiyasikkhāpadānaṁ nidānādīni anekāni pucchitabbāni āyasmantaṁ
anya-e0905n2:171_4: itihidaṁ bhante sikkhāpadasañjātaṁ nimmalaṁ su parisuddhaṁ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n2:171_5: tasmā yathā pure mahākassapādayo mahāthera varā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyasaṅkhātassa buddhasāsanassa
anya-e0905n2:171_6: ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ dhammavinayaṁ
anya-e0905n2:171_8: evameva mayampi dāni chaṭṭhasaṁgīti mahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā imāni sikkhāpadāni yathānuppattaṭṭhānato
anya-e0905n2:174_1: yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:175_3: hatthako bhante sakyaputto titthiyehi saddhiṁ sallapanto avajānitvā paṭijānāti paṭijānitvā avajānāti,
anya-e0905n2:177_1: omasavāde pācittiyañca āvuso bhikkhupesuññe pācittiyañca bhagavatā katthapaññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:178_3: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍantā omasiṁsu tasmiṁca vatthusmiṁ,
anya-e0905n2:178_4: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṁ bhaṇḍanajātānaṁ kalahajātānaṁ vivādāpannānaṁ pesuññaṁ upasaṁhariṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:180_1: anupasampannaṁ āvuso padaso vācentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:181_3: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū upāsake padaso dhammaṁ vācesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:183_1: anupasampannena āvuso uttaridirattatirattaṁ sahaseyyaṁ kappentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:184_3: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:185_0: Pucchā – kesaṁ āvuso ettha anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappentānampi anāpatti hoti.
anya-e0905n2:186_1: ekādasannaṁ bhante puggalānaṁ anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappentānaṁ anāpatti,
anya-e0905n2:186_4: dverattiyo vasitvā tatiyāyarattiyā purāruṇā nikkhamitvā puna vasati,
anya-e0905n2:186_13: imesaṁkho bhante ekādasannaṁ puggalānaṁ anupasampannena sahaseyyaṁ kappentānaṁ anāpatti.
anya-e0905n2:188_1: mātugāmena āvuso sahaseyyaṁ kappentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:189_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:189_2: āyasmā bhante anuruddho mātugāmena sahaseyyaṁ kappesi,
anya-e0905n2:191_1: mātugāmassa āvuso uttari chappañcavācāhi dhammaṁ desentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:192_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:194_1: anupasampannassa āvuso uttarimanussadhammaṁ bhūtaṁ ārocentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:195_1: vesāliyaṁ bhante vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:195_2: vaggumudātīriyā bhante bhikkhū gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:197_1: bhikkhussa āvuso duṭṭhullāpattiṁ anupasampannassa ārocentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:198_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:198_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhussa duṭṭhullāpattiṁ anupasampannassa ārocesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:201_1: āḷaviyaṁ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:203_1: bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:204_1: āḷaviyaṁ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:204_2: āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū rukkhaṁ chindiṁ su,
anya-e0905n2:206_1: aññavādake vihesake pācittiyaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:207_1: kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ channaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:207_2: āyasmā bhante channo saṅghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjīyamāno aññenaññaṁ paṭicari,
anya-e0905n2:209_1: ujjhāpanake khiyyanake pācittiyaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:210_1: rājagahe bhante mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:210_2: mettiyabhūmajakā bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ bhikkhū ujjhāpesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:212_1: saṅghikaṁ āvuso mañcaṁvā pīṭhaṁvā bhisiṁvā kocchaṁvā ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:213_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:213_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū saṅghikaṁ senāsanaṁ ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:215_1: saṅghike āvuso vihāre seyyaṁ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:216_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:216_2: sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū saṅghike vihāre seyyaṁ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:218_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavatā bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n2:221_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n2:224_1: ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ imesaṁ pannarasannaṁ sikkhāpadānaṁ nidānādīni pucchitabbāni anekāni ṭhānāni pucchiṁ,
anya-e0905n2:224_3: iti hidaṁ bhante nimmalaṁ suparisuddhaṁ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa,
anya-e0905n2:224_4: tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā bahujanahitāya
anya-e0905n2:224_5: bahujanasukhāya lonukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ dhammavinayaṁ saṁgāyiṁsuceva anusaṁgāyiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n2:224_6: evameva mayampi dāni chaṭṭhasaṁgītimahādhammasabhā pariyāpannā yathānuppaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya imāni sikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā saṁgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n2:226_2: sammāsambuddhena saṅghike vihāre jānaṁ pubbupagataṁ bhikkhuṁ anupakhajja seyyaṁ kappentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:227_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:227_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū there bhikkhū anupakhajja seyyaṁ kappesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:229_1: bhikkhuṁ āvuso kupitena anattamanena saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhentassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:230_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:230_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā bhikkhū saṅghikāvihārā nikkaḍḍhiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:232_1: uparivehāsakuṭiyā āvuso āhaccapādakaṁ mañcaṁvā pīṭhaṁvā abhinisīdantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:233_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:233_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsa kuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṁ mañcaṁ sahasā abhinisīdi,
anya-e0905n2:235_1: dvatti pariyāye āvuso adhiṭṭhahitvā tatuttari adhiṭṭhahantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:236_1: kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ channattheraṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:236_2: āyasmā bhante chando katapariyositaṁ vihāraṁ punappunaṁ chādāpesi punappunaṁ lepāpesi,
anya-e0905n2:238_1: jānaṁ āvuso sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ tiṇaṁvā mattikaṁvā siñcantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:239_1: āḷaviyaṁ bhante āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:239_2: āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ tiṇampi mattikampi siñciṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:241_1: asammatena āvuso bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:242_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:242_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asammatā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:244_1: atthaṅgate āvuso sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:245_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ cūḷapanthakaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:245_2: āyasmā bhante cūḷapanthako atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadi,
anya-e0905n2:247_1: bhikkhunupassayaṁ āvuso upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassaca āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti
anya-e0905n2:248_1: bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṁ bhante sakkesu chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:248_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṁ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:248_3: āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṁ sāvatthiyaṁ chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:248_4: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantīti bhaṇiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:250_1: aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ dentassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:251_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:251_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ adāsi,
anya-e0905n2:253_1: aññātikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ sibbentassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:254_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:254_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ sibbesi,
anya-e0905n2:256_1: bhikkhunayā āvuso saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:257_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:257_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:259_1: bhikkhuniyā āvuso saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhantassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:260_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:260_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnīhi saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaṁ nāvaṁ abhiruhiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:262_1: jānaṁ āvuso bhikkhuniparipācitaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:263_2: devadatto bhante jānaṁ bhikkhuniparipācitaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñji,
anya-e0905n2:265_1: bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ āvuso eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappentassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:266_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:266_2: āyasmā bhante udāyī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappesi,
anya-e0905n2:268_1: tatuttari āvuso āvasathapiṇḍaṁ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:269_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:269_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṁ paribhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:271_1: gaṇabhojane pācittiyaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:272_2: devadatto bhante sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā bhuñji,
anya-e0905n2:274_1: parampara bhojane pācittiyaṁ āvuso bhagavatā kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:275_1: vesāliyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:275_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū aññatra nimantitā aññatra bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:277_1: dvattipattapūraṁ pūvaṁ paṭiggahetvā tatuttari paṭiggaṇhantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:278_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:278_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū na mattaṁ jānitvā pūvaṁ paṭiggahesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:280_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n2:283_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n2:286_2: sammāsambuddhena bhuttāvinā parivātena anatirittaṁ khādanīyaṁvā bhojanīyaṁvā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:287_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:287_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū bhuttāvī pavāritā aññatra bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:289_1: bhikkhuṁ āvuso bhuttāviṁ pavāritaṁ anatirittena khādanīyena bhojanīyena abhihaṭṭhuṁ pavārentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:290_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:290_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu bhikkhuṁ bhuttāviṁ pavāritaṁ anatirittena bhojanīyena abhihaṭṭhuṁ pavāresi,
anya-e0905n2:292_1: vikāle āvuso khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:293_1: rājagahe bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:293_2: sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū vikāle bhojanaṁ bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:295_1: sannidhikārakaṁ āvuso khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:296_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ belaṭṭhasīsaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:296_2: āyasmā bhante belaṭṭhasīso sannidhikārakaṁ bhojanaṁ bhuñji,
anya-e0905n2:298_1: paṇīta bhojanāni āvuso attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:299_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:299_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū paṇītabhojanāni attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:301_1: adinnaṁ āvuso mukhadvāraṁ āhāraṁ āharantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:302_1: vesāliyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:302_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu adinnaṁ mukhadvāraṁ āhāraṁ āhari,
anya-e0905n2:304_1: acelakassavā āvuso paribbājakassavā paribbājikāyavā sahatthā khādanīyaṁvā bhojanīyaṁvā dentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:305_1: vesāliyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:305_2: āyasmā bhante ānando aññatarissā paribbājikāya ekaṁ maññamāno dve pūve adāsi,
anya-e0905n2:307_1: bhikkhuṁ ehāvuso gāmaṁvā nigamaṁvā piṇḍāya pavisissāmāti tassa dāpetvāvā adāpetvāvā uyyojentassa āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:308_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:308_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto bhikkhu ehāvuso gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisissāmāti tassa adāpetvā uyyojesi,
anya-e0905n2:310_1: sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṁ kappentassa āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:311_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:311_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṁ kappesi,
anya-e0905n2:313_1: mātugāmena saddhiṁ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṁ kappentassaca āvuso mātugāmena saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho
anya-e0905n2:314_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:314_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto mātugāmena saddhiṁ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṁ kappesi,
anya-e0905n2:314_3: mātugāmena saddhiṁ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṁ kappesi,
anya-e0905n2:316_1: nimantitena āvuso sabhattena santaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā purebhattaṁvā pacchābhattaṁvā kulesu cārittaṁ āpajjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:317_1: rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:317_2: āyasmā bhante upanando sakyaputto nimantito sabhatto samāno purebhattaṁ pacchābhattaṁ kulesu cārittaṁ āpajji,
anya-e0905n2:319_1: tatuttari āvuso bhesajjaṁ viññāpentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:320_1: sakkesu bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:320_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū mahānāmena sakkena ajjaṇho bhante āgametāti vuccamānā nāgamesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:322_1: uyyuttaṁ āvuso senaṁ dassanāya gacchantassa ca atirekatirattaṁ senāya vasantassa ca uyyodhikaṁ gacchantassa ca pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:323_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:323_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū uyyuttaṁ senaṁ dassanāya agamaṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:323_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekatirattaṁ senāya vasiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:323_4: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uyyodhikaṁ agamaṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:325_0: Pucchā – surāmerayapāne āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:326_1: kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ sāgataṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:328_0: Pucchā – aṅgulipatodake āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:329_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:329_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ aṅgulipatodakena hāsesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:331_1: udake hasadhamme āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:332_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:332_2: sattarasavaggiyā bhante bhikkhū aciravatiyā nadiyā udake kīḷiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:334_0: Pucchā – anādariya āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:335_1: kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ channaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:335_2: āyasmā bhante channo āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno anādariyaṁ akāsi,
anya-e0905n2:337_1: bhikkhuṁ bhiṁsāpentassa āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:338_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:340_1: jotiṁ āvuso samādahitvā visibbentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:341_1: bhaggesu bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:341_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū jotiṁ samādapetvā visibbesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:343_1: orenaddhamāsaṁ āvuso nahāyantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:344_1: rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:344_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū rājānampi passitvā na mattaṁ jānitvā nahāyiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:346_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n2:349_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viruddhadoso.
anya-e0905n2:352_2: sammāsambuddhena anādiyitvā tiṇṇaṁ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṁ aññataraṁ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṁ navaṁ cīvaraṁ paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:353_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:353_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū attano cīvaraṁ na sañjāniṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:355_1: bhikkhussa āvuso pattaṁ vā cīvaraṁ vā nisīdanaṁ vā sūcigharaṁ vā kāyabandhanaṁ vā apanidhentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:356_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:356_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṁ pattampi cīvarampi apanidhesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:358_1: sañcicca āvuso pāṇaṁ jīvitā voropentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:359_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ āyasmā bhante udāyī sañcicca pāṇaṁ jīvitā voropesi,
anya-e0905n2:361_1: jānaṁ āvuso sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ paribhuñjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:362_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:362_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṁ sappāṇakaṁ udakaṁ paribhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:364_1: jānaṁ āvuso theyyasatthena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:365_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:365_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu jānaṁ theyyasatthena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajji,
anya-e0905n2:367_1: mātugāmena saddhiṁ āvuso saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:368_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:368_2: aññataro bhante bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajji,
anya-e0905n2:370_1: bhikkhūhi āvuso sahadhammikaṁ vuccamānena na tāvāhaṁ āvuso etasmiṁ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi,
anya-e0905n2:370_2: yāva na aññaṁ bhikkhuṁ byattaṁ vinayadharaṁ paripucchissāmīti bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:371_1: kosambiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ channaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:371_2: āyasmā bhante channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno na tāvāhaṁ āvuso etasmiṁ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi,
anya-e0905n2:371_3: yāva na aññaṁ bhikkhuṁ byattaṁ vinayadharaṁ paripucchissāmīti bhaṇi,
anya-e0905n2:373_1: vinayaṁ vivaṇṇentassa āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:374_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:376_0: Pucchā – mohanake āvuso pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ, kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:377_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:378_1: bhikkhussa āvuso kupitena anattamanena pahāraṁ dentassa ca talasattikaṁ uggirantassa ca pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:379_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:379_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā sattarasavaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pahāraṁ adaṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:381_1: bhikkhussa āvuso sañcicca kukkuccaṁ upadahantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:382_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:382_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṁ sañcicca kukkuccaṁ upadahiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:384_1: bhikkhūnaṁ āvuso bhaṇḍanajātānaṁ kalahajātānaṁ vivādā pannānaṁ upassutiṁ tiṭṭhantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:385_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:385_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṁ bhaṇḍanajātānaṁ kalaha jātānaṁ vivādāpannānaṁ upassutiṁ tiṭṭhahiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:387_1: dhammikānaṁ āvuso kammānaṁ chandaṁ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṁ āpajjantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:388_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:388_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū dhammikānaṁ kammānaṁ chandaṁ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṁ āpajjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:390_1: saṅghe āvuso vinicchakathāya vattamānāya chandaṁ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:391_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:391_2: aññataro bhante chabbaggiyo bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṁ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi,
anya-e0905n2:393_1: jānaṁ āvuso saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmentassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:394_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:394_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ puggalassa pariṇāmesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:396_1: pubbe appaṭisaṁviditena āvuso rañño antepuraṁ pavisantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:397_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:397_2: āyasmā bhante ānando pubbe appaṭisaṁvidito rañño antepuraṁ pāvisi,
anya-e0905n2:399_1: ratanaṁ āvuso uggaṇhantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:400_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:402_1: santaṁ āvuso bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṁ pavisantassa pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:403_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:403_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū santaṁ bhikkhuṁ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṁ pavisiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:406_1: sekkhasammatesu āvuso kulesu khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantassa pāṭidesanīyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:407_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:407_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū namattaṁ jānitvā paṭiggahesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:409_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambentena nivāsentassaca pārupantassaca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:410_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:410_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū purato ca pacchato ca olambantā nivāsesuṁceva pārupiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n2:411_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca kāyaṁ vivaritvā antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:412_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggīye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:412_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kāyaṁ vivaritvā antaraghare gacchiṁsu ceva nisīdiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n2:413_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca hatthaṁ vā pādaṁ vā kīḷāpentena antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca,
anya-e0905n2:413_2: tahaṁ tahaṁ olokentena antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca,
anya-e0905n2:413_3: ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:414_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:414_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū hatthampi pādampi kīḷāpentā tahaṁ tahaṁpi olokentā antaraghare gacchiṁsuceva nisīdiṁsu ca,
anya-e0905n2:414_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ukkhittakāya antaraghare gacchiṁsuceva nisīdiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n2:415_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca ujjagghikāya vā uccāsaddaṁ mahāsaddaṁ karontena vā antaraghare gacchantassaca nisīdantassaca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:416_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:416_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū mahāhasitaṁ hasantā ca uccāsaddaṁ mahāsaddaṁ karontā ca antaraghare gacchiṁsuceva nisīdiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n2:417_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca kāyappacālakaṁ vā bāhuppa cālakaṁ vā sīsappacālakaṁ vā khambhakatena vā oguṇṭhitena
anya-e0905n2:417_2: vā antaraghare gacchantassa ca nisīdantassa ca ukkuṭikāya kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattaṁ.
anya-e0905n2:418_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:418_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū kāyappacālakaṁ bāhuppacālakaṁ sīsappacālakaṁ karontā ca khambhīkatā ca oguṇṭhitā ca antaraghare gacchiṁsuceva nisīdiṁsuca,
anya-e0905n2:419_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca pallatthikāya antaraghare nisinnassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:420_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:420_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pallatthikāya antaraghare nisīdiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:421_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca asakkaccaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca tahaṁ tahaṁ olokentena piṇḍapātaṁ
anya-e0905n2:421_2: paṭiggaṇhantassaca sūpaññeva bahuṁ paṭiggaṇhantassaca thūpīkataṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paṭiggaṇhantassaca dukkaṭaṁ
anya-e0905n2:422_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:422_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asakkaccaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paṭiggahesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:423_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca āsakkaccaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassaca tahaṁ tahaṁ olokentana piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa
anya-e0905n2:423_2: ca tahaṁ tahaṁ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa ca sūpaññeva bahuṁ bhuñjantassa ca thūpakato omadditvā
anya-e0905n2:423_3: piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa ca sūpaṁ vā byañjanaṁ vā odanena paṭicchādentassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:424_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:424_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū asakkaccaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:424_4: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tahaṁ tahaṁ omasitvā piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:424_5: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bahuṁ sūpaṁ bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:424_6: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū thūpakato omadditvā piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:424_7: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sūpampi byañjanampi odanena paṭicchādesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:425_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca sūpaṁvā odanaṁvā agilānena attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:426_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:426_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū sūpampi odanampi attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:427_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca ujjhānasaññinā paresaṁ pattaṁ olokentassa ca atimahantaṁ kabaḷaṁ karontassa
anya-e0905n2:427_2: ca dīghaṁ ālopaṁ karontassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:428_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:428_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū ujjhānasaññino paresaṁ pattaṁ olokesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:428_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atimahantaṁ kabaḷaṁ kariṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:428_4: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dīghaṁ ālopaṁ kariṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:429_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṁ vivarantassa ca bhuñjamāne sabbaṁ hatthaṁ mukhe pakkhipantassa
anya-e0905n2:429_2: ca sakabaḷena mukhena byāharantassa ca piṇḍukkhepakaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa ca kabaḷāvacchedakaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ
anya-e0905n2:429_3: bhuñjantassa ca avagaṇḍakārakaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa ca hatthaniddhunakaṁ sitthāvakārakaṁ jivhānicchārakaṁ
anya-e0905n2:429_4: capucapukārakaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjantassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:430_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:430_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū anāhaṭe kabaḷe mukhadvāraṁ vivariṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:431_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca surusurukārakaṁ bhuñjantassaca hatthanillehakaṁvā pattanillehakaṁ vā oṭṭhanillehakaṁ
anya-e0905n2:431_2: vā bhuñjantassa ca sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṁ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare
anya-e0905n2:432_1: suru surukārakaṁ bhante bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ kosambiyaṁ paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:432_3: sambahulā bhante bhikkhū surusurukārakaṁ khīraṁ piviṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:432_5: Hatthanillehakaṁ bhuñjantassa ca pattanillehakaṁ bhuñjantassa ca oṭṭhanillehakaṁ bhuñjantassa dukkaṭaṁ sāvatthiyaṁ paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:433_0: Sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṁ paṭiggaṇhantassa ca sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍentassa ca dukkaṭaṁ bhaggesu paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:433_2: sambahulā bhikkhū sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṁ paṭiggahesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:433_3: teyeva bhante sambahulā bhikkhū sasitthakaṁ pattadhovanaṁ antaraghare chaḍḍesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:434_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca chattapāṇissa dhammaṁ desentassa ca daṇḍapāṇissa vā satthapāṇissa vā āvudhapāṇissa
anya-e0905n2:434_2: vā dhammaṁ desentassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:435_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:435_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū chattapāṇissa daṇḍapāṇissa satthapāṇissa āvudhapāṇissa dhammaṁ desesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:436_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca pādukāruḷhassa ca upahanāruḷhassa ca yānagatassa ca sayanagatassa ca dhammaṁ desentassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:437_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:437_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pādukāruḷhassa upahanāruḷhassa yānagatassa sayanagatassa dhammaṁ desesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:438_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca pallatthikāya nisinnassa ca veṭhitasīsassa ca oguṇṭhitasīsassa ca chamāyaṁ nisīditvā
anya-e0905n2:438_2: āsane nisinnassa ca nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa ca ṭhitena nisinnassa ca pacchato gacchantena
anya-e0905n2:438_3: purato gacchantassa ca uppathena gacchantena pathena gacchantassa ca dhammaṁ desentassa dukkaṭaṁ kattha
anya-e0905n2:439_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:439_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū pallatthikāya nisinnassa ca veṭhitasīsassa ca oguṇṭhitasīsassa ca chamāyaṁ
anya-e0905n2:439_3: nisīditvā āsane nisinnassa ca nīce āsane nisīditvā ucce āsane nisinnassa ca ṭhitānisinnassa ca pacchato
anya-e0905n2:439_4: gacchantā purato gacchantassa ca uppathena gacchantā pathena gacchantassa ca dhammaṁ desesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:440_1: anādariyaṁ āvuso paṭicca ṭhitena uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā karontassa ca harite vā udake vā uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ
anya-e0905n2:440_2: vā kheḷaṁ vā karontassa ca dukkaṭaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:441_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyeva bhikkhū ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:441_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhū ṭhitā uccārampi passāvampi akaṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:441_3: teyeva bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhū haritepi udakepi uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi akaṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:444_1: bhikkhunīnaṁ āvuso pañcama pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:445_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sundarīnandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:445_2: sundarīnandā bhante bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyi,
anya-e0905n2:447_1: ussayavādikāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṁ karontiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:448_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante tullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:449_1: coriṁ āvuso vuṭṭhāpentiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:450_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:451_1: ekāya āvuso gāmantaraṁ gacchantiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:452_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:452_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṁ gacchi,
anya-e0905n2:453_1: avassutāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṁvā bhojanīyaṁvā sahatthā
anya-e0905n2:454_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sundarīnandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:454_2: sundarīnandā bhante bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato āmisaṁ paṭiggahesi tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n2:455_1: kupitāya āvuso anattamanāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsantiyā na paṭinisajjantiyā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:456_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññatto,
anya-e0905n2:456_2: caṇḍakāḷī bhante bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṁ abhaṇi,
anya-e0905n2:458_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n2:461_0: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n2:465_2: sammāsambuddhena lakkhaṇaṁ khādantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:466_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:466_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī na mattaṁ jānitvā bahuṁ lasuṇaṁ harāpesi,
anya-e0905n2:468_1: bhikkhussa āvuso bhuñjamānassa annena vā pānena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhantiyā bhikkhuniyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:469_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:469_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vidhūpanena ca upatiṭṭhati,
anya-e0905n2:471_1: uccāraṁvā āvuso passāvaṁvā saṅkāraṁvā vighāsaṁvā thirokuṭṭe chaḍḍentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:472_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:472_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī uccāraṁ tirokuṭṭe chaḍḍesi,
anya-e0905n2:474_1: naccaṁ vā āvuso gītaṁ vā vāditaṁ vā dassanāya gacchantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:475_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:475_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo naccampi gītampi vāditampi dassanāya agamaṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:476_1: bhikkhupana āvuso naccaṁ vā gītaṁ vā vāditaṁ vā dassanāya gacchanto kaṁ nāma āpattiṁ āpajjati.
anya-e0905n2:479_1: rattandhakāre āvuso apadīpe purisena saddhiṁ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:480_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:480_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī rattandhakāre apadīpe purisena saddhiṁ ekenekā santiṭṭhi,
anya-e0905n2:482_1: paṭicchanne vā āvuso okāse ajjhokāse vā purisena saddhiṁ ekenekāya santiṭṭhantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:483_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:483_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī paṭicchanne okāse ajjhokāse ca purisena saddhiṁ ekenekā santiṭṭhi,
anya-e0905n2:485_1: duggahitena āvuso dūpadhāritena paraṁ ujjhāpentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:486_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:486_2: aññatarā bhante bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṁ ujjhāpesi,
anya-e0905n2:488_1: attānaṁ vā āvuso paraṁ vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:489_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:489_2: caṇḍakāḷī bhante bhikkhunī attānampi parampi nirayenapi brahmacariyenapi abhisapi,
anya-e0905n2:491_1: attānaṁ āvuso vadhitvā vadhitvā rodantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:492_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:492_2: caṇḍakāḷī bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhiṁ bhaṇḍitvā attānaṁ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodi,
anya-e0905n2:494_1: bhikkhuniyā āvuso cīvaraṁ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā neva sibbentiyā na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṁ karontiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:495_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:495_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṁ visibbāpetvā neva sibbesi na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṁ akāsi,
anya-e0905n2:497_1: agārikassa vā āvuso paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā samaṇacīvaraṁ dentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:498_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:498_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī agārikassa samaṇacīvaraṁ adāsi,
anya-e0905n2:500_1: dvinnaṁ āvuso bhikkhunīnaṁ ekamañce vā ekattharaṇapāvuraṇe vā tuvaṭṭentīnaṁ pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:501_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:501_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:503_1: bhikkhuniyā āvuso sañcicca aphāsuṁ karontiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:504_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:504_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sañcicca aphāsuṁ akāsi,
anya-e0905n2:506_1: dukkhitaṁ āvuso sahajīviniṁ neva upaṭṭhentiyā na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ karontiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:507_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁyeva bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:507_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī dukkhitaṁ sahajīviniṁ nevaupaṭṭhesi na upaṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṁ akāsi,
anya-e0905n2:509_1: bhikkhuniyā āvuso upassayaṁ datvā kupitāya anattamanāya nikkaḍḍhantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:510_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁyeva bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:510_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā upassayaṁ datvā kupitā anattamanā nikkaḍḍhi,
anya-e0905n2:512_1: saṁsaṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:513_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante caṇḍakāḷiṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:515_1: antoraṭṭhe vā āvuso tiroraṭṭhe vā sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikāya cārikaṁ carantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:516_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:516_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo antoraṭṭhepi tiroraṭṭhepi sāsaṅkasammate sappaṭibhaye asatthikāyo cārikaṁ cariṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:518_1: antovassaṁ āvuso cārikaṁ carantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:519_1: rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:519_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo antovassaṁ cārikaṁ pakkamiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:521_1: vassaṁ vuṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā cārikaṁ na pakkamantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:522_1: rājagahe bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbhaṁ paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:522_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo vassaṁvuṭṭhā cārikaṁ na pakkamiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:524_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n2:529_2: sammāsambuddhena rājāgāraṁ vā cittāgāraṁ vā ārāmaṁ vā uyyānaṁ vā pokkharaṇiṁ vā dassanāya gacchantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:530_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:530_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo rājāgārampi cittāgārampi dassanāya gacchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:532_1: gihiveyyāvaccaṁ āvuso karontiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:533_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:535_1: agārikassa vā āvuso paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ dentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:536_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:536_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī agārikassa sahatthā khādanīyampi bhojanīyampi adāsi,
anya-e0905n2:538_1: tiracchānavijjaṁ āvuso pariyāpuṇantiyā ca vācentiyā ca pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:539_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:539_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo tiracchānavijjaṁ pariyāpuṇiṁsuceva vācesuñca,
anya-e0905n2:540_1: bhikkhu pana āvuso tādisaṁ tiracchānavijjaṁ pariyāpuṇanto ca vācento ca kiṁ nāma āpattiṁ āpajjati.
anya-e0905n2:543_1: jānaṁ āvuso sabhikkhukaṁ ārāmaṁ anāpucchā pavisantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:544_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:544_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo ārāmaṁ anāpucchā pavisiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:546_1: bhikkhuṁ āvuso akkosantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:547_1: vesāliyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:547_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo āyasmantaṁ upāliṁ akkosiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:549_1: caṇḍikatāya āvuso gaṇaṁ paribhāsantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:550_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:550_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī caṇḍikatāya gaṇaṁ paribhāsi,
anya-e0905n2:552_1: kulaṁ āvuso maccharāyantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:553_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante aññataraṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:555_1: abhikkhuke āvuso āvāse vassaṁ vasantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:556_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:556_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo abhikkhuke āvāse vassaṁ vasiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:558_1: vassaṁ vuṭṭhāya āvuso bhikkhuniyā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavārentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:559_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:559_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo vassaṁ vuṭṭhā bhikkhusaṅghaṁ na pavāresuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:561_1: ovādāya vā āvuso saṁvāsāya vā nagacchantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:562_1: sakkesu bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:564_1: uposathampi āvuso na pucchantiyā ovādampi na yācantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:565_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:565_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo uposathaṁ na pucchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:567_1: gabbhiniṁ vā āvuso pāyantiṁ vā vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:568_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:570_1: dve vassāni āvuso chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṁ sikkhamānaṁ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:571_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:571_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṁ sikkhamānaṁ vuṭṭhāpesuṁ,
anya-e0905n2:573_1: purisasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ āvuso kumārakasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ caṇḍiṁ sokāvāsaṁ sikkhamānaṁ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:574_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:574_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī purisasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ kumārakasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ caṇḍiṁ sokāvāsaṁ caṇḍakāḷiṁ sekkhamānaṁ vuṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0905n2:576_1: mātāpitūhi vā āvuso sāmikena vā ananuññātaṁ sikkhamānaṁ vuṭṭhāpentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:577_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante thullanandaṁ bhikkhuniṁ ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:577_2: thullanandā bhante bhikkhunī mātāpitūhipi sāmikenapi ananuññātaṁ sikkhamānaṁ vuṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0905n2:579_1: chattupāhanaṁ āvuso dhārentiyā ca yānena yāyantiyā ca pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:580_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:582_1: itthālaṅkāraṁ āvuso dhārentiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:583_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:584_0: Pucchā – bhikkhu pana āvuso purisālaṅkāraṁ dhārento kiṁ nāma āpattiṁ āpajjeyya.
anya-e0905n2:587_1: gandhavaṇṇakena āvuso nahāyantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:588_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:590_1: bhikkhussa āvuso purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:591_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:591_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo bhikkhussa purato anāpucchā āsane nisīdiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:593_1: anokāsakataṁ āvuso bhikkhuṁ pañhaṁ pucchantiyā pācittiyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:594_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante sambahulā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:594_2: sambahulā bhante bhikkhuniyo anokāsakataṁ bhikkhuṁ pañhaṁ pucchiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:595_1: sappiṁ vā āvuso telaṁ vā madhuṁ vā phāṇitaṁ vā macchaṁ vā maṁsaṁ vā khīraṁ vā dadhiṁ vā viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā pāṭidesanīyaṁ kattha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:596_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo ārabbha paññattaṁ,
anya-e0905n2:596_2: chabbaggiyā bhante bhikkhuniyo sappimpi telampi madhumpi phāṇitampi macchampi maṁsampi khīrampi dadhimpi viññāpetvā bhuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0905n2:597_0: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n2:599_0: Pucchā – channaṁ āvuso āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0905n2:600_4: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0905n2:600_6: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, navācato,
anya-e0905n2:600_7: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0905n2:606_1: na evarūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu,
anya-e0905n2:608_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
